dcterms:description: A dataset containing 114 intravenous contrast-enhanced CT scans of oral squamous cell carcinoma (OSCC) patients, used to validate the proposed method for detecting metastatic lymph nodes.
dcterms:title: Intravenous contrast-enhanced CT images of oral squamous cell carcinoma (OSCC) patients

dcterms:description: A dataset containing 82 head & neck intravenous contrast-enhanced CT scans with 3D segmentation masks of 7 lymph node stations provided by radiologists, used for training the LN station segmentation model.
dcterms:title: Lymph node station segmentation dataset
